lead_paragraph: KATZ--Terry, died peacefully at her home in Boca Raton, FL, on June 21. Beloved wife of Irwin Katz. Beloved mother to Toni Ponnel and Tracy Katz and grandmother of Craig and Lauren Ponnel. In addition, she leaves her brother and sister-in-law Joel and Sandy Busel. 1/3
